Name: Lord of Bones
About the game: Lord of Bones is a classic action - adventure platform game with awesome gameplay, graphics and sound tracks. In this game you will find yourself in the story of an old gold digger. At the beginning of this story, he takes you on one of his many trips to the caves. However, while searching for the treasures that these caves have to offer, he stumbles upon a mysterious chamber containing a teleport to a mysterious world. This unknown place is full of monsters, mysterious passages, doors, secret traps, artifacts and spells. There is only one way to get back from this unknown world. And that is to defeat the evil Lord of Bones. But you have to be careful because it won't be an easy task. Created by one person.
